actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer title to Mirage Flats Irrigation Project works to the landowners within the Mirage Flats Irrigation District.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer title to the Mirage Flats irrigation project works, Nebraska, to the landowners within the Mirage Flats Irrigation District.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer title to Mirage Flats Irrigation Project works to the landowners within the Mirage Flats Irrigation District.
